# SuiviFinancier - ASP.NET Core MVC Project

This is a financial tracking application built with ASP.NET Core MVC.

## Project Structure

- Controllers: HomeController, TransactionController, BudgetController, AccountController, UserController
- Models: User, Account, Category, Transaction, Budget, AppDbContext
- Views: Home, Transactions, Budgets, Accounts, Shared
- wwwroot: css, js, images

## Development Guidelines

- Follow MVC architectural pattern
- Use Entity Framework Core for data access
- Maintain clean separation of concerns
